Row.Text: Hello there. Another contender in this game?
Well well. What do we have here?
Hello. I've been waiting for you to show up.
This was getting stale. Nof if you would excuse me, I have more important tasks to do.
You may have defeated me, but you have yet to win the game.
Oh? Time's up, let's go see what Ran is doing.
Listening to you speak is such a bore.
No matter what you say, you won't get it.
Whatever you are trying right then, won't convince me.
Hello there.
Do you need something?
Hmm, it's you again.
Welcome.
Well?
I was hoping you would be gone by now.
Oh? Come over to finish the job?
This war ceases to benefit me any longer. How about an end to the fighting?
If it wern't for international law, you would be floating in some cool dark matter right about now.
Hello, we've been having some fun sending your scientists to different dimensions these last few months.
Oh my, I was prepared for this.
How have you been doing? Well?
Hello again. {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} has become quite bothersome as of late. The sooner they go the better.
Stopping by for a quick update? Just to let you know, when we go to war against {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} try to keep your head on your shoulders.
Well, it's you again. Has your war ended yet? Your armies destroyed?
Oh, I'm surprised you are here. That war going smoothly for you?
You again? You hope to stand any chance against me with your army?
Being the Youkai of Boundaries, I find your military actions near our borders disrespectful.
Eh, more land? Your boundaries there won't last much longer.
Prepare that military of yours. You will only serve as a stepping stone for your enemies with all that easy land for the picking.
The tile buying mechanic annoys me; you abuse it way too much.
Have lots of money but nowhere to spend it eh? At least buy tiles away from us.
Hello, some nice troops you have there.
Well well, I'm surprised you're doing so well.
Oh dear. Your boundary lines are quite pathetic. It would be such a pity if someone were to take it.
You have such a nice lack of troops. I'm tempted to just pop over there for a few resources here and there.
Oh, you. You seem to have an unhealthy obsession with war human.
Let's get this over with, quickly.
Oh, why are you here?
Oh, it's you. {1_PlayerName} has been making too many friends lately.
Hello there, {1_PlayerName} has been mentioning you as a reliable ally for our plans.
Well, I can already tell how you'll be like, seeing how you've denounced {1_PlayerName}.
Hello, it seems like you hate {1_PlayerName} too. Good for you.
Really now? Don't you feel like you're jumping the gun a bit?
Wish to join me in denouncing {1_CivName}? We have cookies.
{1_CivName} has been a pain and needs to be removed from the game. It would be great if you were to lend a hand.
I knew you would turn on me. Let the world know of your treachery[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]She has publicly denounced you! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])

I wonder why I even added you as a friend. Everything pointed to this line of action. Be gone![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]She has publicly denounced you! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
Ha, you're denouncing one of the most powerful youkai that ever existed. Have you really put any effort in writing your plans?
Oh good, it's nice to see another friend.
Oh? Do you think joining with {1_CivName} will do you any good?
Well, exactly on cue. It was obvious you would denounce my friend.
It is nice to see some observant leaders out there.
Your partnership with {1_CivName} would suit my plans well.
Oh? So you also understand my feelings towards {1_CivName}.
Allying yourself with {1_CivName} won't help you towards the end.
I won't let you achieve much in your plans against {1_CivName}.
([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Oops. If you see this and know what is happening, comment back with this line:[NEWLINE]TXT_KEY_LEADER_YUKARI_ATTACKED_PROTECTED_CITY_STATE_1[ENDCOLOR])
Now, that expansion rate is too much. Cease at once.
You are expanding quite rapidly. It is troublesome.
You dare settle near me even after our agreement?
Cease your endless plot grabbing at once, or be prepared face the consequences.
As the Youkai of Boundaries, your purchases of land near by borders disrespects me.
Breaking your promise? Your precious new land won't be yours much longer.
Just coming by to tell you of your failure and inadequacy of protecting your City-States from me and my forces.
It appears that I have overlooked your protection of your City-State while drafting my plans. I apologize, it surely is a shame.
Will you be willing to join together to forward our plans?
Coop Terminated : WARMONGER ([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Oops. If you see this and know what is happening, comment back with this line:[NEWLINE]TXT_KEY_LEADER_YUKARI_END_WORK_WITH_US_WARMONGER_1[ENDCOLOR])
Coop Terminated : CITY-STATES ([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Oops. If you see this and know what is happening, comment back with this line:[NEWLINE]TXT_KEY_LEADER_YUKARI_END_WORK_WITH_US_MINORS_1[ENDCOLOR])
Coop Terminated : LAND-GRAB ([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Oops. If you see this and know what is happening, comment back with this line:[NEWLINE]TXT_KEY_LEADER_YUKARI_END_WORK_WITH_US_LAND_1[ENDCOLOR])
Coop Terminated : WONDERS ([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Oops. If you see this and know what is happening, comment back with this line:[NEWLINE]TXT_KEY_LEADER_YUKARI_END_WORK_WITH_US_WONDERS_1[ENDCOLOR])
Coop Terminated : VICTORY ([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Oops. If you see this and know what is happening, comment back with this line:[NEWLINE]TXT_KEY_LEADER_YUKARI_END_WORK_WITH_US_VICTORY_1[ENDCOLOR])
Coop Terminated : FIN ([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Oops. If you see this and know what is happening, comment back with this line:[NEWLINE]TXT_KEY_LEADER_YUKARI_END_WORK_WITH_US_DEFAULT_1[ENDCOLOR])
You must be labeled as someone who cannot be trusted.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]She has publicly denounced you! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
I denounce you.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]She has publicly denounced you! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
Hidden Pact end ([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Ehh... If you see this and know what is happening, comment back with this line:[NEWLINE]TXT_KEY_LEADER_YUKARI_END_WORK_WITH_US_DEFAULT_1[ENDCOLOR])
{1_PlayerName:textkey} has to go. Would you like the honors of destroying them with me?
It is time for war with {1_PlayerName:textkey}.
I gave you a chance, but now I know never to trust you ever again.
It seems that we cannot come to terms together. You are now our enemy.
Impressive.
This mod is lame. The mod creator didn't give me any good buildings or units, and my trait doesn't help me much. I should be dominating right now!
You like seeing animated models kill each other a bit too much for a sane person, unless you have animations turned off. In that case you are even more messed up.
My influence with {1_MinorCivName:textkey} is much more valuable to them than yours are.
Great.
This will greatly benefit the plan.
Excellent.
Thanks, I appreciate it.
I am grateful for your actions.
Oh well, I should have seen that coming.
Eh? Such a shame.
Fine.
So be it.
My thanks for returning the worker. I will make sure they are more careful in the future.
Oh? You wish to fight my boundaries?
Your stupidity and insolence knows no boundaries.
Your lack of a military shows how tactically inept you really are.
Your nuclear weapons cannot weaken my boundaries.
You only beat up those weaker then you, pathetic.
How can you win if you can't even keep your own people happy.
You like clumping all your people in singular places, like animals.
How can you have a civilization if you don't even have people?
Your culture is the only culture that spawns undesirables.

{2_MajorCivName:textkey} announces to the world that it is now guaranteeing the borders of {1_MinorCivName:textkey}. Attacking this City-State will greatly damage relations with this civilization and may lead to war.
{2_MajorCivName:textkey} announces to the world that it has taken back its guarantee of {1_MinorCivName:textkey}.
Never.
Absolutely not.
I accept. The land near you will never become useful to me.
Eh? Stop my expansion? Impossible, you cannot resist the expansion of the boundary.
Of course. Working with you has its benefits.
No.
Absolutely not.

I will work against someone, yes.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]This should not appear. Something went wrong. If you want, you can send TXT_KEY_LEADER_YUKARI_WORK_AGAINST_SOMEONE_YES to me and I will write up something for this.[ENDCOLOR])
Having this conflict would forward my plans. I accept.
I accept, but wait ten turns. I need time to gather my forces.
Fine. You can have it.
I am not afraid of you, why will I consent?
You must be stupid if you believe I would give you what you want given our relations.
Giving you all this will benefit you too much. No.
I believe I have already answered no.
Dot Dot Dot
Oh?
It is time to end this conflict. How will this suit you?
Sorry, but my plans require some supplies from you.
It seems that you have something I would like.
This item would be very useful for me. What would you like in exchange?
I don't like sharing open boundaries with someone else, but I guess I have to.
I can't seem to get past your borders. I have to make some sort of Open Borders offer first, annoyingly.
We may have a breakthrough soon, so I might ask for some of your scientists later. Okay?[NEWLINE][NEWLINE](Agreeing will not form a Research Agreement yet)
We have quite a scientific breakthrough over here. I would like some extra scientists, to further our research a bit more. You can have some of our extra data as well.
Great, I couldn't have asked for anything better.
Well, fine. It's good enough.
I expected as much.
Hmm, I'll keep this in mind for when I deal with you in the future.
Unacceptable!
How foolish of you to think that I would accept such a skewed proposition.
This is fine as it is.
This should go well for both our plans.
No amount of talk will convince me to take that deal.
I've been expecting this much. Prepare to be beaten past the boundaries of recognition.
I have a plan for this. Just wait and see.
I've been wanting to remove you for some time, and now I can do it without being called a warmonger.
This is going to be quite amusing.
Excellent, prepared to be defeated by our city defenses.
I've been testing out some gaps for our troops. Let me know if they are effective or not after you lose, ok?
So it seems that our plans must clash together in the end.
You've been on the back of my head for some time. I have already prepared for the worst.
Your boundaries are to be removed from this game, effective immediately.
I knew you wouldn't keep your word.
All your land are belong to us.
It is time for the boundaries of the Domain to have no end.
This wasn't in the plan, but it was so tempting I had to.
I follow this saying, "If you are trying to go somewhere, sitting still will lead you nowhere", so I decided to spice things up.
Time for your destruction. Don't worry, it was nothing personal.
Time to put my plan into action. Taking you out from behind was my first priority.
Unfortunately, my plans run headlong into you, so you will have to go, despite your neutral existance.
You expect me not to just go over and take it? I even asked for it politely. Well, fine by me.
What do you have to offer?
This ties in nicely to my plans.
Oh, you finally see the eventual outcome and beg for mercy? You shall have none of it.
I've just started this war with you. You want to pull out already?
You won't get away with that.
Oh? Really?
You're words have no effect on me.
Good.
Don't make an enemy of me.
Good.
Exactly how I predicted.
Excellent.
You can do nothing to halt our plans.
Scared to leave your borders?
I hope in the future my plans won't displease you.
Good.
Excellent, that will wrap up several things in my plans.
I found this shady person loitering around one of my gaps. Seems like they were your spy.
Someone was looking into my gaps without permission. They received a face-full of danmaku as a consolation prize.
I've been noticing some more eyes in my gaps lately, and they arn't mine.
A pity my spy died in this dimension.
Sorry, I gapped some others here and didn't expect them to stay in your cities for so long.
I am fine with that.
Your words mean nothing to me.
I will gap them back. They were getting bored too.
They are having fun. Just let them be.
I already knew, but thanks for the info.
{1_PlayerName} wants you gone. Just letting you know.
Just so you know, {1_PlayerName} plans involve {2_CityName}, and something about it being in flames.
Just so you know, {1_PlayerName} plans involve blood being shed, most likely yours.
{1_PlayerName} has been distributing lots of maps to their ships, all with arrows pointing at {2_CityName}.
I saw through one of my gaps that {1_PlayerName} has been producing lots of posters with ships on them and a big X over your face.
A pity.
That works out fine for me.
I don't like how your prophets and missionaries trample over my borders.
Finally my borders will know some peace.
The bounds of your faith are limited.
I don't have anything else to give for that.
I'm sure my religion bonuses would benefit you in some way, but if you wish.
My religion is beautiful, and your people will follow it.
